NK041(di)028:1: // slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa'i mnol bsang lha chab sngon mo bzhugs so //
NK041(di)028:2: pad+ma sam b+ha wa la na mo /
NK041(di)028:3: slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis bsam yas mchims phu'i brag phug tu sgrub pa mdzad pa'i tshe /
NK041(di)028:4: rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan gyi khams yun ring ma bde zhing /
NK041(di)028:5: yul du btsa' sad ser gsum nad yams mu ge
NK041(di)028:6: la sogs mi bde ba'i mtshan ma mang du byung
NK041(di)028:7: bas / blon po rnams kyis gros byas nas sman
NK041(di)028:8: pa mo ma rtsis pa gang la gang dgos pas
NK041(di)028:10: sman pa'i zhal nas nad 'du ba bzhi'i rtsa ni mi 'dug /
NK041(di)028:11: bying 'thib kyi rtsa zhig 'dug pas mi gtsang ba'i snyun nad cig yin pa 'dra zer /
NK041(di)028:13: rtsis pas rtsis byas pa thams cad zhal 'chams par
NK041(di)028:14: mi gtsang ba'i mnol grib kyis rgyal po dang yul
NK041(di)028:15: lha thams cad 'khrugs 'dug zer ba las /
NK041(di)028:16: de sman pa mo rtsis sogs kyis rgyu rkyen gang lta bus mnol ba ma shes /
NK041(di)028:17: rgyal po'i btsun mo mong bza' khri lcam bya ba
NK041(di)028:18: la rtsog mnol gyi bu gcig byung ba btsun mos
NK041(di)028:19: gsang nas khol mo gcig la gtad de khyod kyis
NK041(di)028:20: sus kyang mi mthong bar sbas pa gal che zer
NK041(di)028:21: ba bzhin khol mos sa phag zhig tu sbas pa
NK041(di)028:22: sa bdag gi lto bar 'phrad pas sa bdag yul
NK041(di)028:23: lha thams cad la mi gtsang ba'i grib phog nas
NK041(di)028:24: 'khrugs pas rgyal po dang yul khams thams cad du
NK041(di)028:26: der khol mo yang mi gtsang ba'i grib phog nas
NK041(di)028:27: na ste mgo dang yan lag thams cad zha grum
NK041(di)028:28: du song / sman pa bos nas bstan pas 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad mi 'dug /
NK041(di)028:29: mi gtsang ba'i mnol grib phog 'dug pas gang gis
NK041(di)028:30: mnol mi shes pas khyod kyi nad 'di la phan
NK041(di)028:31: pa'i thabs gzhan med zer ba na /
NK041(di)028:32: der khol mos khri lcam gyi bu sbas tshul rnams
NK041(di)028:33: zhib tu bshad pas gcig smras gnyis smras rgyal po'i
NK041(di)028:34: snyan du gsan / rgyal pos khri lcam bos nas dris pas /
NK041(di)028:35: khri lcam gyis khol mo la srog nyen yong dgongs nas drang por ma zhus pas /
NK041(di)028:36: rgyal po thugs dgongs 'khrug nas khri lcam la chad pa gcod dgongs pa la /
NK041(di)028:37: khri lcam o rgyan rin po che'i drung du skyabs 'tshol du song /
NK041(di)028:38: der o rgyan rin po ches rgyal po la phyag mdud yi ge dang bcas pa bskur nas /
NK041(di)028:39: da btsun mo khri lcam 'di la chad pa gcod par dgongs pa 'dra yang /
NK041(di)028:40: nga snang srid bden med du rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin /
NK041(di)028:41: sna tshogs kyi snang ba rten 'brel du bsgyur shes pa yin pas /
NK041(di)028:42: mi gtsang ba'i mnol grib 'di bas nyon mongs dug lnga'i grib kyang sel bar byed nus /
NK041(di)028:43: bya sla ba tshig nyung la don che ba'i sel thabs yod /
NK041(di)028:44: rdzas dang yo byad 'di ltar dgos pas thams cad tshogs par gyis la /
NK041(di)028:45: rgyal po thugs khrel mi gnang bar sang rgyal blon
NK041(di)028:46: 'khor bcas bsam yas has po ri'i rtse mor byon
NK041(di)028:48: rgyal po shin tu dga' ste rdzas dang yo byad rnams bsags nas /
NK041(di)028:49: sang has po ri'i rtse mor byon pa la /
NK041(di)028:50: der slob dpon chen po bzhugs te rgyal po'i phyag
NK041(di)028:51: nas byung ba'i rdzas rnams thab snod yangs shing rgya
NK041(di)028:52: che ba'i nang du bsregs te cho ga ni 'di
NK041(di)028:54: sems can kun kyang ma rig 'thibs pas mnol //
NK041(di)028:55: nyon mongs dug lngas ye shes lha lnga mnol //
NK041(di)028:56: sgo gsum mi dges lus ngag yid gsum mnol //
NK041(di)028:57: 'dul khriims nyams pas lus kyi mkha' 'gro mnol //
NK041(di)028:58: dam tshig nyams pas rdo rje slob dpon mnol //
NK041(di)028:59: tshogs gtor chung bas ma dang mkha' 'gro mnol //
NK041(di)028:60: phud nyams lhag mas chos skyong srung ma mnol //
NK041(di)028:61: ser sna bsags pas bka' srung dam can mnol //
NK041(di)028:62: ting 'dzin 'khrugs pas srid pa'i ma mo mnol //
NK041(di)028:63: brtse gdung 'khrugs pas mched dang lcam dral mnol //
NK041(di)028:64: zhe sdang 'khrugs pas zhi ba'i lha rnams mnol //
NK041(di)028:65: nga rgyal 'khrugs pas rgyas pa'i lha rnams mnol //
NK041(di)028:66: 'dod chags 'khrugs pas dbang gi lha rnams mnol //
NK041(di)028:67: phrag dog 'khrugs pas drag po'i lha rnams mnol //
NK041(di)028:68: gti mug 'khrugs pas gsal byed lha rnams mnol //
NK041(di)028:69: dkar dmar thab gzhob yul lha gnyan po mnol //
NK041(di)028:70: 'thab mkhon 'khrugs pas byes lha gnyan po mnol //
NK041(di)028:71: mi gtsang thab kyis khyim lha gnyan po mnol //
NK041(di)028:72: mi gtsang dri mas mgon skyabs lha rnams mnol //
NK041(di)028:73: khyad par mi gtsang bud med bang sme yis //
NK041(di)028:74: steng 'og bar gsum lha klu gnyan rnams mnol //
NK041(di)028:75: phug lha sgo nor khyim lha khyim bdag mnol //
NK041(di)028:76: lus ngag yid dang dgra lha phrag lha mnol //
NK041(di)028:78: lus mnol lus kyi mdangs nyams lus stobs shor //
NK041(di)028:79: mgo mjing ro stod na zhing mig mi gsal //
NK041(di)028:80: ngag mnol skad 'gag lkug cing smra mi bde //
NK041(di)028:81: mchil snabs mang zhing sna mtshul lce 'og skrang //
NK041(di)028:82: yid mnol yid mi bde zhing tshig pa za //
NK041(di)028:83: brjed nges gnyid 'thibs bying zhing mtshan mo g.yer //
NK041(di)028:84: mgo mnol mgo 'khor mig 'grib rna ba 'on //
NK041(di)028:85: yan lag mnol bas zha grum sbrid cing na //
NK041(di)028:86: pho mtshan mnol bas mi 'greng rtsa dkar mang //
NK041(di)028:87: mo mtshan mnol bas srid kyi skye 'phro chad //
NK041(di)028:88: rgyab brten mnol bas gzhi yi las mi 'grub //
NK041(di)028:89: dgra lha mnol bas dgra sri thad kar ldang //
NK041(di)028:90: byes lha mnol bas mgo 'thom grogs dang 'bral //
NK041(di)028:91: mgron lha mnol bas mgron rnams don mi 'grub //
NK041(di)028:92: gzhis lha mnol bas gzhi la sdod mi tshugs //
NK041(di)028:93: yul lha mnol bas nang 'khrugs mu ge 'byung //
NK041(di)028:94: khang lha mnol bas 'tshag cing tsag sgra 'byin //
NK041(di)028:95: sbra lha mnol na hrul zhing ldog 'gyur mang //
NK041(di)028:96: nor lha mnol bas stong zhing 'phel mi 'gyur //
NK041(di)028:97: phyugs lha mnol bas spu byi ltas ngan 'byung //
NK041(di)028:98: zhing lha mnol na zhing sa khol bur stong //
NK041(di)028:99: thab lha mnol na bcud med stong zhing 'gong //
NK041(di)028:100: grogs lha mnol na za khar 'gong po 'jug /
NK041(di)028:101: go mtshon mnol na go ral rno mtshon rtul //
NK041(di)028:102: rta pho mnol na rgal rngog mgo lag nyams //
NK041(di)028:103: sgo khyi mnol na skad 'gag mtshan rdzi zhan //
NK041(di)028:104: kha rje mnol na ma rabs lad mo shoms //
NK041(di)028:105: dbang thang mnol na brjed nges dbang po zhum //
NK041(di)028:106: rlung rta'i lha mnol sems stor don mi 'grub //
NK041(di)028:107: srog gi lha mnol gnyid 'thibs dran pa nyams //
NK041(di)028:108: lus kyi lha mnol sha 'gul sha ro ldang //
NK041(di)028:109: phrag lha mnol na bkrag mdangs gzi mdangs nyams //
NK041(di)028:110: rgyab brten lha srung mnol na sems mi bde //
NK041(di)028:111: lus kyi sha mnol sha 'chor nyams stobs chung //
NK041(di)028:112: rus mnol rus kun zug cing srin 'bu ldang //
NK041(di)028:113: khrag mnol thig le pad+ma rnag khrag 'dzag /
NK041(di)028:114: lpags mnol chu bur brdol zhing za phrug byed //
NK041(di)028:115: chu rgyus rtsa mnol zha grum sbrid cing skrang //
NK041(di)028:116: spu mnol spu rnams byi zhing glog skyi 'thul //
NK041(di)028:117: gzhan yang rme mnol rtsog mnol rmugs kyis mnol //
NK041(di)028:118: yug sa'i mnol dang rabs chad pho mo'i mnol //
NK041(di)028:119: nal bu mo mtshan zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i mnol //
NK041(di)028:120: zas mnol gos mnol thab gzhob mkhon gyi mnol //
NK041(di)028:121: shi ba'i dur sri gson po'i nang dme'i mnol //
NK041(di)028:122: sdig can bshan pa mna' zan gri bo'i mnol //
NK041(di)028:123: phud nyams mi gtsang yas dang glud kyis mnol //
NK041(di)028:124: de la sogs pa'i mnol grib thams cad kun //
NK041(di)028:125: 'byung ba'i dwangs ma lnga las grub pa yi //
NK041(di)028:126: sa la brten cing chu yis rab tu brlan //
NK041(di)028:127: me yis drod bskyed rlung gis rab bskyod pas //
NK041(di)028:128: rtsa ba klu yi gnas nas skyes pa'i shing //
NK041(di)028:129: rtse mo lha yi gnas su smin pa'i shing //
NK041(di)028:130: lo 'dab mi yi gnas su khyab pa'i shing //
NK041(di)028:131: dri yis phyogs rnams ma lus khyab pa'i shing //
NK041(di)028:132: kha dog dri ro nus bcud ldan pa'i shing //
NK041(di)028:133: shing mchog tsan+dana dkar dmar a ga ru //
NK041(di)028:134: gser shing mkhan pa g.yu shing shug pa dang //
NK041(di)028:135: dung shing ba lu stag pa spen dkar dang //
NK041(di)028:136: 'om bu rba smyug nya sbrid gser mgo dang //
NK041(di)028:137: pho shing mo shing bu shing shing sna'i tshogs //
NK041(di)028:138: 'bras bu gsum dang bzang drug sman sna'i tshogs //
NK041(di)028:139: dri ldan ro nus kha dang ska ba'i rigs //
NK041(di)028:140: nas 'bras gro dang so ba yungs ma dang //
NK041(di)028:141: 'bru sna dkar nag 'bru yi rigs byed dang //
NK041(di)028:142: dar zab rin chen rtsi bcud phye mar dang //
NK041(di)028:143: gser skyems chang dang shing tog khu ba'i bcud //
NK041(di)028:144: dkar gsum phud dang mngar gsum dwangs ma dang //
NK041(di)028:145: sha khrag la sogs dbang po rnam lnga'i gsur //
NK041(di)028:146: byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam rdzas dkar dmar dang //
NK041(di)028:147: gu gul dkar nag dri spos sna tshogs sogs //
NK041(di)028:148: phyi nang gsang gsum mnol grib bsal ba'i rdzas //
NK041(di)028:149: mes bsreg chus bkrus rlung gis rab gtor ba'i //
NK041(di)028:150: nam mkha' bzhin du stong par gyur pa'i ngang //
NK041(di)028:151: ram las skyes pa'i me la bsregs pa yi //
NK041(di)028:152: dri mchog dri gsur rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //
NK041(di)028:153: ye shes dri med ngang du sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:155: ma rig dbang gis mnol na rang byung ye shes bsang //
NK041(di)028:156: dug lnga'i dbang gis mnol na rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bsang //
NK041(di)028:157: sgo gsum mi dges mnol na sku gsum lha rnams bsang //
NK041(di)028:158: 'dul khrims zhig pas mnol na lus kyi mkha' 'gro bsang //
NK041(di)028:159: phud nyams lhag mas mnol na chos srung ma tshogs
NK041(di)028:160: gtor chung bas mnol na ma dang mkha' 'gro dam
NK041(di)028:161: tshig nyams pas mnol na rdo rje slob dpon brtse
NK041(di)028:162: gdung 'khrugs pas mnol na mched dang lcam dral dam
NK041(di)028:163: rdzas nang 'gras mnol na gtsang ris mgon po ser
NK041(di)028:164: sna bsags pas mnol na nor lha g.yang lha mkhon
NK041(di)028:165: grib mi gtsang mnol na bka' srung dam can ting
NK041(di)028:166: 'dzin 'khrugs pas mnol na srid pa'i ma mo brtse
NK041(di)028:167: gdung chung bas mnol na snying rje'i mgron rnams zhe
NK041(di)028:168: sdang 'khrugs pas mnol na zhi ba'i lha rnams nga
NK041(di)028:169: rgyal 'khrugs pas mnol na rgyas pa'i lha rnams 'dod
NK041(di)028:170: chags 'khrugs pas mnol na dbang gi lha rnams phrag
NK041(di)028:171: dog 'khrugs pas mnol na drag po'i lha rnams gti
NK041(di)028:172: mug 'khrugs pas mnol na gsal byed lha rnams gnod
NK041(di)028:173: grib 'khrugs pas mnol na yul lha gnyan po 'thab
NK041(di)028:174: 'khon 'khrugs pas mnol na khyim lha gnyan po nyams
NK041(di)028:175: chag grib mas mnol na lhag pa'i lha rnams mi
NK041(di)028:176: gtsang dri yis mnol na mgon skyabs lha rnams rabs
NK041(di)028:177: chad dur sris mnol na srid kyi lha rnams mna'
NK041(di)028:178: zan gri bos mnol na pho lha dgra lha sdig
NK041(di)028:179: can bshan pas mnol na lhag pa'i lha rnams dme
NK041(di)028:180: yugs mi gtsang mnol na sangs byed rnams gshin po'i
NK041(di)028:181: ro grib mnol na phrag lha gnyan po gson po'i
NK041(di)028:182: nang dmes mnol na 'go ba'i lha lnga thab kyis
NK041(di)028:183: mnol na khang lha sbra lha gzhob kyi mnol na
NK041(di)028:184: pha lha ma lha yugs sas mnol na ma lha
NK041(di)028:185: bu rdzi lus spyi mnol na lhan skyes lha rnams
NK041(di)028:186: ngag mnol gsung snyan grags stong lha rnams yid mnol
NK041(di)028:187: dran byed gsal stong lha rnams yan lag mnol na
NK041(di)028:189: rmug pa dwangs par byed pa'i lha rnams 'thib pa
NK041(di)028:190: sangs par byed pa'i lha rnams gtsang rtsog dbye bar
NK041(di)028:191: byed pa'i lha rnams mnol ba sangs par byed pa'i
NK041(di)028:192: lha rnams khyad par mi gtsang bud med bang rme
NK041(di)028:193: yis // steng 'og bar gsum lha klu gnyan la sogs //
NK041(di)028:194: phug lha sgo nor khyim lha khyim bdag dang //
NK041(di)028:195: lus ngag yid dang dgra lha phrag lha dang //
NK041(di)028:196: nor lha g.yang lha gos nor longs spyod la //
NK041(di)028:197: mnol grib mi gtsang dri mas gos pa rnams //
NK041(di)028:198: rtsi shing sman mchog dri gsur sna tshogs dang //
NK041(di)028:199: phyi nang gsang gsum 'dod yon dpag med kyis //
NK041(di)028:200: mi gtsang mnol grib dri ma sangs rgyur cig /
NK041(di)028:201: de nas bye brag tu bsang ba 'di skad do //
NK041(di)028:203: shing rtsi dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:204: bla ma yi dam mnol ba sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:205: ye shes lha rnams rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:206: sman sna tsan+dana dri yis sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:207: 'jig rten lha rnams rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:208: spos dkar shing sna'i dri yis ma sring mkha' 'gro rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:209: b+ha la d+h+aa ra dri yis chos skyong srung ma rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:210: sha khrag sna tshogs dri yis gtsang ris mgon po rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:211: dkar gsum mngar gsum dri yis lha srin sde brgyad rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:212: shing rtsi sman mchog dri yis bka' srung dam can rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:213: phye mar 'o skol dri yis lha rnams mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:214: spos dkar g.yu shug dri yis klu rnams mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:215: klu sman sna tshogs dri yis gnyan rnams mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:216: dar tshon stag gzig dri yis sa bdag mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:217: nya sbrid gser mgo dri yis gnas bdag mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:218: stag pa sur dkar dri yis gzhi bdag mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:219: mkhan pa gser mgo dri yis yul lha mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:220: rba smyug dkar gsum dri yis nor lha mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:221: phye mar zas phud dri yis g.yang lha mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:222: rin chen sna tshogs dri yis khang lha mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:223: dar zab sna tshogs dri yis thab lha mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:224: sha phud chang phud dri yis zhing lha mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:225: 'bru zan sna tshogs dri yis pho lha mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:226: dar tshon sna tshogs dri yis dgra lha mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:227: phye mar dpa' skyems dri yis byes lha mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:228: 'bras dkar rtsi bcud dri yis mgron lha mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:229: sha chang gser skyems dri yis skyes lha mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:230: lha shing sur dkar dri yis lus lha mi gtsang rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:231: gu gul dkar nag dri yis srung skyob lha rnams rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:232: shing 'bras me tog dri yis rig byed lha rnams rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:233: g.yu shug pa lu'i dri yis rgyab brten lha rnams rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:234: spos sna shing sna'i dri yis lus kyi go mtshon rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:235: lha chab sman sna'i dri yis zas nor longs spyod rtsog gis mnol gyur na //
NK041(di)028:236: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis shel sgong bzhin du phyi nang gsal gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:237: de nas bsang dud rnams sku gsung thugs rten la bdug cing 'di skad do //
NK041(di)028:239: bla yi dam mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:240: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis sangs rgyas cig /
NK041(di)028:241: dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:242: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis chos skyong srung ma mnol ba yod na yang /
NK041(di)028:243: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis pho nya las mkhan mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:244: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis gtsang ris lha rnams mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:245: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis lha srin sde brgyad mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:246: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis 'jig rten skyong ba mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:247: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis steng gi lha rnams mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:248: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis bar gyi gnyan rnams mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:249: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis 'og gi klu rnams mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:250: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis gzhi bdag gnas bdag mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:251: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis mched dang lcam dral mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:252: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis 'jig rten lha srung mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:253: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis sa gzhi'i gnas sa mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:254: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis rgyud kyi lha srung mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:255: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis 'go ba'i lha lnga mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:256: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis ma lha bu rdzi mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:257: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis rta lha 'phan po mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:258: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis nor lha phyug po mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:259: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis lug lha men po mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:260: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis ra lha tsher mo mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:261: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis zhing lha tshangs pa mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:262: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis phug lha ge thung mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:263: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis sgo lha stag g.yag mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:264: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis thab lha yol mo mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:265: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis pho lha dgra lha mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:266: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis nor lha g.yang lha mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:267: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis phyugs lha mdzod lha mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:268: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis zas lha grogs lha mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:269: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis byes lha mgron lha mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:270: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:271: phyi nang gi rten rdzas sogs la bdug cing 'di skad do //
NK041(di)028:273: rnal 'byor dpon slob mi nor 'khor bcas kyi //
NK041(di)028:274: lha dang srung ma mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:275: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:276: lha khang dri med mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:277: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis lha gos ber khrab mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:278: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis lha rgyan lhab lhub mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:279: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis lha mtshon rno ngar mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:280: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis lha zas ro brgya mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:281: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis lha btung gser skyems mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:282: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis lha rta btsan po mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:283: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis lha g.yag zhol mo mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:284: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis lha lug don po mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:285: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis lha ra khra bo mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:286: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis srung ma'i dam rdzas mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:287: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis srung ma'i spyan gzigs mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:288: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis mchod rdzas sgrub rdzas mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:289: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis rten rdzas sna tshogs mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:290: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis lha srung thugs dang 'gal ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:291: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:292: de nas mi nor sogs la bdug cing 'di skad do //
NK041(di)028:294: bdag cag dpon slob mi nor 'khor bcas kyi //
NK041(di)028:295: srid kyi dbang thang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:296: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:297: mkhas pa'i btsun g.yang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:298: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis gtso bo'i blo g.yang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:299: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis gzhon nu'i dpa' g.yang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:300: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis skyen po'i mtheb g.yang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:301: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis mang po'i tshogs g.yang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:302: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis rta pho'i mgyogs g.yang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:303: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis phyugs kyi 'phel g.yang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:304: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis zas kyi bcud g.yang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:305: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis btsan po'i stobs g.yang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:306: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis phyug po'i nor g.yang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:307: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis 'phan po'i dar yang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:308: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis btsan phyug 'phan gsum mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:309: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis gzhan yang rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor bcas kyi //
NK041(di)028:310: gyon pa'i ber gos mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:311: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis btags pa'i rno mtshon mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:312: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis btung ba'i zas skom mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:313: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis gzhi mal gnas sa mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:314: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis 'dug pa'i mal stan mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:315: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis mi nor rigs brgyud mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:316: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis bran dang sgo khyi mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:317: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis zas nor longs spyod mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:318: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis stobs dang mnga' thang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:319: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis bkrag dang gzi mdangs mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:320: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis tshe dang bsod nams mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:321: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis kha rje dbang thang mnol ba yod na yang //
NK041(di)028:322: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:323: dmigs bsal gyi nad pa 'dra yod na 'di ltar bya /
NK041(di)028:325: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:326: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:327: nyon mongs dug lnga'i gdung ba sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:328: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:329: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:330: 'dod chags las gyur rlung nad sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:331: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:332: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:333: zhe sdang las byung mkhris nad shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:334: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:335: gti mug las byung bad kan shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:336: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:337: 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad rnams shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:338: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:339: snying rlung rgyal po'i nad rnams shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:340: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:341: glo gzer klu btsan nad rnams shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:342: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:343: mchin rgyu sa bdag nad rnams shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:344: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:345: mtsher glo gri bo'i nad rnams sangs shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:346: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:347: mkhal grum klu bsen nad rnams shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:348: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:349: pho gcong yid 'gong nad rnams shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:350: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:351: mgo dang yan lag nad rnams shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:352: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:353: sha dang lpags pa'i nad rnams sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:354: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:355: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:356: khrag dang chu ser nad rnams sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:357: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:358: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:359: rus dang srin bu'i nad rnams sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:360: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:361: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:362: rtsa dang chu rgyus nad rnams sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:363: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:364: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:365: mdangs dang dbang po nyams pa sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:366: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:367: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:368: dbugs dang rnam shes nyams pa sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:369: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:370: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:371: dpal dang mthu stobs nyams shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:372: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:373: tshe dang bsod nams nyams pa shing mchog dri bzang sman gyi dud pa 'dis //
NK041(di)028:374: bdag dang rgyu sbyor yon gyi bdag po yi //
NK041(di)028:375: kha rje dbang thang nyams pa sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:376: de ltar gyi dmigs bsal med na gong gi 'phro nas 'di bzhin bya /
NK041(di)028:377: gzhan yang bdag cag dpon slob 'khor bcas la //
NK041(di)028:378: dme mnol rtsog gis mnol dang grib kyis mnol //
NK041(di)028:379: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:380: thab dang gzhob kyis mnol dang yugs sas mnol //
NK041(di)028:381: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis byi byas rabs chad zla mtshan nal bus mnol //
NK041(di)028:382: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis mdze can gcong po dam nyams grib kyis mnol //
NK041(di)028:383: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis dri can dri ngan can dang rmug dris mnol //
NK041(di)028:384: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis shi ba'i dur sri gson po'i nang dmes mnol //
NK041(di)028:385: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis sdig can bshan pa mna' zan gri bos mnol //
NK041(di)028:386: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis phud nyams mi gtsang yas dang glud kyis mnol //
NK041(di)028:387: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis gzhan yang mi gtsang mnol grib ma lus kun //
NK041(di)028:388: shing mchog dri bzang sman gyis nam mkha' sprin dwangs bzhin du sangs gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:389: nyi zla'i 'od mdangs bzhin du rgyas gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:390: zla ba yar ngo bzhin du 'phel gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:391: me tog 'dab stong bzhin du rgyas gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:392: ston ka'i 'bru drug bzhin du smin gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:393: chab srid lhun po bzhin du brtan gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:394: dgos 'dod nor bu bzhin du 'byung gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:395: chos brgyud nyi zla bzhin du gsal gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:396: 'khor 'bangs skar tshogs bzhin du 'khor gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:397: nor phyugs rtsi shing bzhin du rgyas gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:398: snyan grags 'brug sgra bzhin du khyab gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:399: tshe ring nad med bde dang ldan gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:400: lo brgya 'tsho zhing ston brgya mthong gyur cig /
NK041(di)028:401: bkra shis bde legs phun sum tshogs par shog /
NK041(di)028:403: rgyal blon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams the tshom ma byed /
NK041(di)028:404: 'di lta bu nyams len byas na don dang ldan pa yin no gsungs so //
NK041(di)028:405: de nas rgyal blon 'khor bcas dga' zhing mgu nas yi rang ste /
NK041(di)028:406: gser gyi man+dala phul te phyag dang bskor ba byas nas 'di skad do //
NK041(di)028:409: rgyun du nyams len ji ltar bya /
NK041(di)028:412: slob dpon chen po'i zhal nas /
NK041(di)028:415: spyir dal 'byor gyi mi lus thob pa don ldan du byed dgos /
NK041(di)028:416: de'i thabs su byang chub kyi rgyu sgrub pa la
NK041(di)028:417: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha dang
NK041(di)028:418: srung ma la gsol ba btab pas /
NK041(di)028:419: byang chub sgrub pa'i 'gal rkyen bar chad sel zhing
NK041(di)028:420: mchog thun mong gi dngos grub mthun rkyen bsgrub pa
NK041(di)028:421: yin pas de'i ched du lha dang srung ma bsten
NK041(di)028:422: dgos pa yin / bsang bya ba ni nyon mongs sdug lnga'i sgrib mnol sbyor zhing /
NK041(di)028:423: lha dang srung ma mi 'bral bar 'khor ba'i thabs yin pas /
NK041(di)028:424: rgyun du bsang bya ba don dang ldan pa yin /
NK041(di)028:425: lhag par mnol grib mi gtsang ba myur du sel ba'i thabs su snga dro lha bsang bya /
NK041(di)028:426: phyi dro mnol bsang dang mnol khrus byas na grib dang mi gtsang ba thams cad sbyangs /
NK041(di)028:428: zas nor longs spyod la byin chags /
NK041(di)028:433: snang srid lha 'dres bka' la nyan /
NK041(di)028:434: 'gal rkyen bar chad kyi dri mas mi gos pa
NK041(di)028:435: sogs yon tan mang po dang ldan pa yin gsungs
NK041(di)028:436: so // der rgyal po'i zhal nas /
NK041(di)028:437: legs so slob dpon chen po lags /
NK041(di)028:438: mnol khrus bya ba ji ltar yin lags zhus pas /
NK041(di)028:439: slob dpon chen po'i zhal nas /
NK041(di)028:440: mnol khrus bya ba ni spyir mdo sngags so so'i lugs dang 'dra /
NK041(di)028:441: rdzas sbyor sogs dbye ba mang du yod kyang 'di'i
NK041(di)028:442: skabs su gong gi sman rdzas dang dri sna tshogs
NK041(di)028:443: chu gtsang dang sbyar nas rin po che'i bum pa'i
NK041(di)028:444: nang du blugs la yul phyogs su chab gtor bran
NK041(di)028:446: yang sku gsung thugs kyi rten rnams la khrus gsol bya ba ni rten khrus dang /
NK041(di)028:447: mi nad phyugs nad sogs la rdo rje rnam 'joms
NK041(di)028:448: khro bo rme brtsegs bdud rtsi 'khyil ba sogs kyi
NK041(di)028:449: nga rgyal dang ldan pas grib khrus dang nor rdzas
NK041(di)028:450: sogs la grib phog na khrus chab bran pas chog
NK041(di)028:452: der rgyal po chen po dgyes shing gus pas thal
NK041(di)028:453: mo sbyar te phyag dang bskor ba mang du byas
NK041(di)028:454: nas slar pho brang du gshegs so //
NK041(di)028:455: de nas yun ring ma lon par rgyal po'i bsnyung nad dwangs te /
NK041(di)028:456: yul khams bod du bkra shis pa'i dge ltas mang po byung ngo //
NK041(di)028:457: slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa'i
NK041(di)028:458: mnol bsang lha chab sngon mo zhes bya ba rdzogs
NK041(di)028:459: so //// mnol bsang 'di dang bsang barngana bde legs
NK041(di)028:460: kun 'byung bcas gter la ma sbas par pe har
NK041(di)028:461: dkor mdzod gling gi phyi khyams ldebs ris su btab
NK041(di)028:462: par mdzad pas bsam yas logs bris mar grags /
NK041(di)028:463: de las dpe rgyun 'phel te dbus gtsang phyogs su rgya cher 'phel zhing /
NK041(di)028:464: lhag par slob dpon bee ro tsa nas dpe bsnams
NK041(di)028:465: te rgyal mo tsha ba rong du phebs pa'i lam
NK041(di)028:466: zhor mdo smad du ldi ri chos kyi grags pa
NK041(di)028:467: la gnang ba nas rim par brgyud de mdo khams
NK041(di)028:468: smad phyogs su da lta'i bar dar rgyas shin tu
NK041(di)028:470: 'di la grong sngags mkhas blun mang po'i kha ton
NK041(di)028:471: lag bris kyi dpe rgyun tshig ris cung zad 'dra
NK041(di)028:472: min mang du snang ba las dpe dag pa 'ga'
NK041(di)028:473: zhig la gzhi bcol te zhus dag dpyad bzod pa'i
NK041(di)028:474: khul du 'jigs bral ye shes rdo rjes gtsang bshus
